languages.text: "То Бог-Император услышал наши молитвы и послал Лорд-капитана, которо{mf|му|й} не плевать на простой люд!"
"The God-Emperor has heard our prayers and sent us a Lord Captain who cares about us small folk!"
languages.original_text: "То Бог-Император услышал наши молитвы и послал Лорд-капитана, которо{mf|му|й} не плевать на простой люд!"

traits.locale_text: "The God-Emperor heard our prayers and sent Lord Captain who does care about us small folk!"
"The God-Emperor heard our prayers and sent Lord Captain who does care about us small folk!"
"The God-Emperor has heard our prayers and sent us a Lord Captain who cares about us small folk!"
"The God-Emperor has heard our prayers and sent us a Lord Captain who cares about us small folk!"
"The God-Emperor has heard our prayers and sent us a Lord Captain who cares about us small folk!"
"The God-Emperor has heard our prayers and sent us a Lord Captain who cares about us small folk!"
"The God-Emperor has heard our prayers and sent us a Lord Captain who cares about us small folk!"
"The God-Emperor has heard our prayers and sent us a Lord Captain who cares about us small folk!"

languages.text: « L'Empereur-Dieu a entendu nos prières et nous a envoyé {mf|un seigneur-capitaine|une seigneure-capitaine} qui se soucie du des petites gens ! »
languages.original_text: "The God-Emperor has heard our prayers and sent us a Lord Captain who cares about us small folk!"

traits.locale_text: « L'Empereur-Dieu a entendu nos prières et nous a envoyé {mf|un seigneur-capitaine|une seigneure-capitaine} qui se soucie du des petites gens ! »

languages.text: «¡El Dios Emperador ha escuchado nuestras plegarias y nos ha enviado un{mf||a} Lord Capitán que se preocupa por la gente modesta!».
languages.original_text: "The God-Emperor has heard our prayers and sent us a Lord Captain who cares about us small folk!"

traits.locale_text: «¡El Dios Emperador ha escuchado nuestras plegarias y nos ha enviado un{mf||a} Lord Capitán que se preocupa por la gente modesta!».

languages.text: 「神帝陛下が祈りを聞き入れて、我々のような小市民を気にかけてくださるロード・キャプテンを遣わしてくださった！」
languages.original_text: "The God-Emperor has heard our prayers and sent us a Lord Captain who cares about us small folk!"

traits.locale_text: 「神帝陛下が祈りを聞き入れて、我々のような小市民を気にかけてくださるロード・キャプテンを遣わしてくださった！」

languages.text: “神皇听到了我们的祈祷！祂为我们派来的舰长大人真的很关心我们这些底层人民！”
languages.original_text: "The God-Emperor has heard our prayers and sent us a Lord Captain who cares about us small folk!"

traits.locale_text: “神皇听到了我们的祈祷！祂为我们派来的舰长大人真的很关心我们这些底层人民！”

languages.text: "Der Gottimperator hat unsere Gebete erhört und einen Lord Captain geschickt, dem wir kleine Leute am Herzen liegen!"
languages.original_text: "The God-Emperor has heard our prayers and sent us a Lord Captain who cares about us small folk!"

traits.locale_text: "Der Gottimperator hat unsere Gebete erhört und einen Lord Captain geschickt, dem wir kleine Leute am Herzen liegen!"

languages.text: "Tanrı İmparator dualarımıza kulak verip bizim gibi acizleri umursayan bir Lord Kaptan gönderdi!"
languages.original_text: "The God-Emperor has heard our prayers and sent us a Lord Captain who cares about us small folk!"
